metadata.name: Panda
metadata.description:
The Panda, a symbol of gentle strength:  
The panda is also known for its gentle but strong nature. If you want to be able to face challenges with a calm demeanor, the wisdom of the panda can help you achieve this.

⊹ Gentle strength  
⊹ Peace  
⊹ Good luck  
⊹ Positive outlook on life

Illustration: Illustrator, Photoshop  
Animation: After Effects

1536 x 1920 px | 29.97 fps | 10s seamless loop | .mp4 | running on $CKGUIDES smart contract
